Building a personal website has never been easier. With Quarto, you can create a beautiful site without touching much HTML or CSS.

![](../img/sky.jpg)

## Why Build a Personal Website?

A personal website is a great way to:
- Showcase your work and portfolio
- Share your thoughts through blog posts
- Build your personal brand
- Have a centralized hub on the internet

## Structure

A typical Quarto website includes:
- **Home page**: A welcoming introduction
- **About page**: Tell people who you are
- **Blog/Notes**: Share your thoughts
- **Projects**: Showcase your work

## Hosting Options

- GitHub Pages (free)
- Netlify
- Vercel
- Traditional web hosts

The beauty of Quarto is that once your site is built, you can deploy it anywhere.
